purpose: To provide a comprehensive collection of prompts designed for enhancing interactions with ChatGPT and other GPT models, facilitating better prompt engineering practices.
principle: To curate high-quality, effective prompts that improve user engagement and response quality in AI-driven conversations.
reusability: The prompts are designed to be reusable across different applications and contexts, allowing users to adapt and modify them for various use cases.
limitations: The effectiveness of the prompts may vary based on the specific implementation of GPT models and the context in which they are used.
name: awesome-prompts
description: Curated list of chatgpt prompts from the top-rated GPTs in the GPTs Store. Prompt Engineering, prompt attack & prompt protect. Advanced Prompt Engineering papers.
language: Multi-language support including TypeScript, Python, Go, and more.
highlight: Curated collection of high-quality prompts for enhancing ChatGPT interactions and prompt engineering practices.
